subject: handling null pointer ... best practise?
msgSnippet: Dear Sir, I have the following scenario. I am trying to connect database. Database is down. In first case I didn t taken care of null pointer exception. In
messageBody:
Dear Sir,

I have the following scenario.
I am trying to connect database.
Database is down.

In first case I didn't taken care of null pointer exception.
In second case taken care of null pointer exception.

Which one is the best practice?

Regards,
Bhavani.
